short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost productivity with multi-copy features, streamlining workflow by selecting preferred clipboard items to paste.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
#Clipboard #ClipboardExtension #ClipboardManager #MultiCopy #History #Fast #WorkSpeed #UserHelper #CopiedTextManagerExtension #FavouriteItems #InstantPaste #Windows Compatible #MultipleTextAtOnePlace #Copy #Clip Board #Clipboard Extension #Clipboard Manager

Elevate your productivity with this user's Clipboard Google Chrome extension software – your ultimate clipboard companion. 
Seamlessly copy and paste multiple texts, supercharging your workflow by pasting them instantly. 
Compatible with Windows OS, it extends clipboard functionality across your browser and system. 
Access copied items using familiar shortcuts, Ctrl+Alt+V, and effortlessly navigate between selections using keyboard shortcuts. Search and manage saved items with ease, all while ensuring your privacy – no personal data transfer. 
Optimize your clipboard experience, streamline your tasks, and stay efficient with this reliable browser-level tool.

Shortcuts:
----------------
1. Ctrl+C (Default system shortcut, Copy to clipboard.)
2. Ctrl+Alt+V (Accessing clipboard on chrome browser)
3. Window+V (Accessing clipboard on Windows)
     (Check if not enabled, Follow)
     - Open Settings, and click on System.
     - Choose Clipboard (You can search with search box - Find a setting).
     - Toggle the Clipboard History to the “on” position.
4. Esc key (Escape key 2 times: To hide clipboard)

Features:
---------------
1. It will store your copied text in integrated Chrome storage, eliminating the need for third-party outsourcing..
2. Easily accessible using keyboard shortcuts. Will increase your interaction with browser and your document.
3. Compatible with Windows OS.
4. Tab indexed to move/navigate between copied items.
5. Search box to search from saved items.
6. Can access on any tab on browser.
7. Can clear all items one by one or all at once.
